screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .trmap file in Team Run
screenshot.caption: TRMAP file open in Team Run

description: In Team Run, players attempt to complete a series of platforming levels, either solo or as a team. Players can also build and play their own Team Run levels, using the game's level Constructor.

Each Team Run level is saved as a TRMAP file. Optionally, players can export their custom Team Run levels as TRMAP files, to share the maps with other players. To export a TRMAP file, a player goes to the Constructor's EDIT screen and selects the SAVE button that appears next to the map they want to export.
